/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars of various colors are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
